ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a protected object belongs.

ClearMajorProtectionBlackIp.title: ClearMajorProtectionBlackIp
ClearMajorProtectionBlackIp.summary: Clears an IP address blacklist for major event protection.

CopyDefenseTemplate.title: CopyDefenseTemplate
CopyDefenseTemplate.summary: Creates a new protection template from the copy.

CreateApiExport.title: CreateApiExport
CreateApiExport.summary: Creates a data export task in the API security module.

CreateCerts.title: CreateCerts
CreateCerts.summary: Uploads a certificate that uses an internationally accepted algorithm for a domain name added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in CNAME record mode.

CreateCloudResource.title: CreateCloudResource
CreateCloudResource.summary: Adds a service to Web Application Firewall (WAF). This operation is supported for only the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) and Classic Load Balancer (CLB) services.

CreateDomain.title: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.summary: Adds a domain name to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

CreateHybridCloudGroup.title: CreateHybridCloudGroup
CreateHybridCloudGroup.summary: Creates a node group for a hybrid cloud cluster.

CreateLogDeliveryConfig.title: CreateLogDeliveryConfig
CreateLogDeliveryConfig.summary: Creates a hybrid cloud log delivery configuration.

CreateMajorProtectionBlackIp.title: CreateMajorProtectionBlackIp
CreateMajorProtectionBlackIp.summary: Creates an IP address blacklist for major event protection.

CreateMemberAccounts.title: CreateMemberAccounts
CreateMemberAccounts.summary: Adds members to use the multi-account management feature of Web Application Firewall (WAF).

CreatePostpaidInstance.title: CreatePostpaidInstance
CreatePostpaidInstance.summary: Creates a pay-as-you-go Web Application Firewall (WAF) 3.0 instance.

CreateSM2Cert.title: CreateSM2Cert
CreateSM2Cert.summary: Uploads a ShangMi (SM) certificate for a domain name that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in CNAME record mode.

DeleteApisecAbnormals.title: DeleteApisecAbnormals
DeleteApisecAbnormals.summary: Deletes multiple risks detected by the API security module at a time.

DeleteApisecEvents.title: DeleteApisecEvents
DeleteApisecEvents.summary: Deletes multiple security events detected by the API security module at a time.

DeleteCloudResource.title: DeleteCloudResource
DeleteCloudResource.summary: Removes a service from Web Application Firewall (WAF). This operation is supported for only the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) and Classic Load Balancer (CLB) services.

DeleteDomain.title: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.summary: Deletes a domain name that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DeleteLogDeliveryConfig.title: DeleteLogDeliveryConfig
DeleteLogDeliveryConfig.summary: Delets a hybrid cloud log delivery configuration.

DeleteMajorProtectionBlackIp.title: DeleteMajorProtectionBlackIp
DeleteMajorProtectionBlackIp.summary: Deletes an IP address blacklist for major event protection.

DeleteMemberAccount.title: DeleteMemberAccount
DeleteMemberAccount.summary: Removes the members that are added for multi-account management in Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeAccountDelegatedStatus.title: DescribeAccountDelegatedStatus
DescribeAccountDelegatedStatus.summary: Queries whether an Alibaba Cloud account is the delegated administrator account of a Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

DescribeApiExports.title: DescribeApiExports
DescribeApiExports.summary: Queries the list of data export tasks in the API security module.

DescribeApisecAbnormalDomainStatistic.title: DescribeApisecAbnormalDomainStatistic
DescribeApisecAbnormalDomainStatistic.summary: Queries the statistics on domain names on which risks are detected by the API security module.

DescribeApisecAbnormals.title: DescribeApisecAbnormals
DescribeApisecAbnormals.summary: Queries the list of API security risks.

DescribeApisecApiResources.title: DescribeApisecApiResources
DescribeApisecApiResources.summary: Queries API assets in the API security module.

DescribeApisecAssetTrend.title: DescribeApisecAssetTrend
DescribeApisecAssetTrend.summary: Queries the asset trends in the API security module.

DescribeApisecEventDomainStatistic.title: DescribeApisecEventDomainStatistic
DescribeApisecEventDomainStatistic.summary: Queries the statistics on domain names on which security events are detected by the API security module.

DescribeApisecLogDeliveries.title: DescribeApisecLogDeliveries
DescribeApisecLogDeliveries.summary: Queries the configurations of API security log subscription.

DescribeApisecMatchedHosts.title: DescribeApisecMatchedHosts
DescribeApisecMatchedHosts.summary: Queries the list of domain names detected in the API security module.

DescribeApisecProtectionGroups.title: DescribeApisecProtectionGroups
DescribeApisecProtectionGroups.summary: Queries the list of protected object groups to which API security policies are applied.

DescribeApisecProtectionResources.title: DescribeApisecProtectionResources
DescribeApisecProtectionResources.summary: Queries the list of protected objects to which API security policies are applied.

DescribeApisecRules.title: DescribeApisecRules
DescribeApisecRules.summary: Queries the policies configured in the API security module.

DescribeApisecSensitiveDomainStatistic.title: DescribeApisecSensitiveDomainStatistic
DescribeApisecSensitiveDomainStatistic.summary: Queries the statistics on domain names on which sensitive data is detected by the API security module.

DescribeApisecSlsLogStores.title: DescribeApisecSlsLogStores
DescribeApisecSlsLogStores.summary: Queries the Logstores whose names start with apisec- in Simple Log Service.

DescribeApisecSlsProjects.title: DescribeApisecSlsProjects
DescribeApisecSlsProjects.summary: Queries the projects whose names start with apisec- in Simple Log Service.

DescribeApisecStatistics.title: DescribeApisecStatistics
DescribeApisecStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of API security-related risks and events.

DescribeApisecSuggestions.title: DescribeApisecSuggestions
DescribeApisecSuggestions.summary: Queries the protection suggestions for APIs.

DescribeApisecUserOperations.title: DescribeApisecUserOperations
DescribeApisecUserOperations.summary: Queries user operation records in the API security module.

DescribeCertDetail.title: DescribeCertDetail
DescribeCertDetail.summary: Queries the details of a certificate, such as the certificate name, expiration time, issuance time, and associated domain name.

DescribeCerts.title: DescribeCerts
DescribeCerts.summary: Queries the certificates issued for your domain names that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeCloudResourceAccessPortDetails.title: DescribeCloudResourceAccessPortDetails
DescribeCloudResourceAccessPortDetails.summary: Queries the port details of a cloud service instance that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF). This operation is supported only for Elastic Compute Service (ECS), Classic Load Balancer (CLB), and Network Load Balancer (NLB) instances.

DescribeCloudResourceAccessedPorts.title: DescribeCloudResourceAccessedPorts
DescribeCloudResourceAccessedPorts.summary: Queries the ports of the cloud service that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF). This operation is supported for only Elastic Compute Service (ECS) and Classic Load Balancer (CLB).

DescribeCloudResources.title: DescribeCloudResources
DescribeCloudResources.summary: Queries cloud service resources that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeCnameCount.title: DescribeCnameCount
DescribeCnameCount.summary: Queries the total number of domain names that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in CNAME record mode and hybrid cloud reverse proxy mode.

DescribeDDoSStatus.title: DescribeDDoSStatus
DescribeDDoSStatus.summary: Checks whether DDoS attacks occur on specific domain names protected by a Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

DescribeDefaultHttps.title: DescribeDefaultHttps
DescribeDefaultHttps.summary: Queries the default SSL and Transport Layer Security (TLS) settings.

DescribeDefenseResource.title: DescribeDefenseResource
DescribeDefenseResource.summary: Queries the information about a protected object.

DescribeDefenseResourceGroup.title: DescribeDefenseResourceGroup
DescribeDefenseResourceGroup.summary: Queries the information about a protected object group.

DescribeDefenseResourceGroupNames.title: DescribeDefenseResourceGroupNames
DescribeDefenseResourceGroupNames.summary: Queries the names of protected object groups.

DescribeDefenseResourceGroups.title: DescribeDefenseResourceGroups
DescribeDefenseResourceGroups.summary: Performs a pagination query to retrieve the information about protected object groups.

DescribeDefenseResourceNames.title: DescribeDefenseResourceNames
DescribeDefenseResourceNames.summary: Performs a pagination query to retrieve the names of protected objects.

DescribeDefenseResourceTemplates.title: DescribeDefenseResourceTemplates
DescribeDefenseResourceTemplates.summary: Queries the protection templates that are associated with a protected object or protected object group.

DescribeDefenseTemplateValidGroups.title: DescribeDefenseTemplateValidGroups
DescribeDefenseTemplateValidGroups.summary: Queries the names of protected object groups for which a protection template can take effect.

DescribeDefenseTemplates.title: DescribeDefenseTemplates
DescribeDefenseTemplates.summary: Performs a paging query to retrieve protection templates.

DescribeDomainDNSRecord.title: DescribeDomainDNSRecord
DescribeDomainDNSRecord.summary: Checks whether the Domain Name System (DNS) settings of a domain name are properly configured.

DescribeDomainDetail.title: DescribeDomainDetail
DescribeDomainDetail.summary: Queries the details of a domain name that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeDomains.title: DescribeDomains
DescribeDomains.summary: Queries the domain names that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeFlowChart.title: DescribeFlowChart
DescribeFlowChart.summary: Queries the traffic statistics of requests that are forwarded to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeFlowTopResource.title: DescribeFlowTopResource
DescribeFlowTopResource.summary: Queries the top 10 protected objects that receive requests.

DescribeFlowTopUrl.title: DescribeFlowTopUrl
DescribeFlowTopUrl.summary: Queries the top 10 URLs that are used to initiate requests.

DescribeFreeUserAssetCount.title: DescribeFreeUserAssetCount
DescribeFreeUserAssetCount.summary: Queries the asset statistics provided by basic detection in the API security module.

DescribeFreeUserEventCount.title: DescribeFreeUserEventCount
DescribeFreeUserEventCount.summary: Queries the statistics of security events that are detected by using the basic detection feature of the API security module.

DescribeFreeUserEventTypes.title: DescribeFreeUserEventTypes
DescribeFreeUserEventTypes.summary: Queries the types of security events on which basic detection is performed in the API security module.

DescribeFreeUserEvents.title: DescribeFreeUserEvents
DescribeFreeUserEvents.summary: Queries the list of security events on which basic detection is performed in the API security module.

DescribeHybridCloudBasicMonitor.title: DescribeHybridCloudBasicMonitor
DescribeHybridCloudBasicMonitor.summary: Queries the system status of a node in a hybrid cloud cluster.

DescribeHybridCloudClusterRule.title: DescribeHybridCloudClusterRule
DescribeHybridCloudClusterRule.summary: Obtains the rule information about a hybrid cloud cluster.

DescribeHybridCloudClusters.title: DescribeHybridCloudClusters
DescribeHybridCloudClusters.summary: Queries a list of hybrid cloud clusters.

DescribeHybridCloudGroups.title: DescribeHybridCloudGroups
DescribeHybridCloudGroups.summary: Queries the hybrid cloud node groups that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeHybridCloudProcessMonitor.title: DescribeHybridCloudProcessMonitor
DescribeHybridCloudProcessMonitor.summary: Queries the status of applications running on a hybrid cloud cluster node.

DescribeHybridCloudProtectableCount.title: DescribeHybridCloudProtectableCount
DescribeHybridCloudProtectableCount.summary: Queries the number of protection nodes that can be added to a hybrid cloud cluster.

DescribeHybridCloudResources.title: DescribeHybridCloudResources
DescribeHybridCloudResources.summary: Queries the domain names that are added to a Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance in hybrid cloud mode.

DescribeHybridCloudServerRegions.title: DescribeHybridCloudServerRegions
DescribeHybridCloudServerRegions.summary: Queries information about the regions that the hybrid cloud mode supports, such as the Internet service providers (ISPs), continents, and cities.

DescribeHybridCloudUnassignedMachines.title: DescribeHybridCloudUnassignedMachines
DescribeHybridCloudUnassignedMachines.summary: Queries servers that are not assigned to a hybrid cloud cluster.

DescribeHybridCloudUnsupportPorts.title: DescribeHybridCloudUnsupportPorts
DescribeHybridCloudUnsupportPorts.summary: Queries the ports that are not supported by the hybrid cloud mode.

DescribeHybridCloudUser.title: DescribeHybridCloudUser
DescribeHybridCloudUser.summary: Queries the HTTP and HTTPS ports that you can use when you add a domain name to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in hybrid cloud mode.

DescribeInstance.title: DescribeInstance
DescribeInstance.summary: Queries the details of a Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance within the current Alibaba Cloud account.

DescribeLogDeliveryConfig.title: DescribeLogDeliveryConfig
DescribeLogDeliveryConfig.summary: Queries a hybrid cloud log delivery configuration.

DescribeLogDeliveryConfigs.title: DescribeLogDeliveryConfigs
DescribeLogDeliveryConfigs.summary: Queries all hybrid cloud log delivery configurations.

DescribeMajorProtectionBlackIps.title: DescribeMajorProtectionBlackIps
DescribeMajorProtectionBlackIps.summary: Queries IP addresses in an IP address blacklist for major event protection by page.

DescribeNetworkFlowTimeSeriesMetric.title: DescribeNetworkFlowTimeSeriesMetric
DescribeNetworkFlowTimeSeriesMetric.summary: Retrieves time-series data for all network traffic, including both malicious and legitimate requests.

DescribeNetworkFlowTopNMetric.title: DescribeNetworkFlowTopNMetric
DescribeNetworkFlowTopNMetric.summary: Retrieves top aggregated traffic statistics, sorted by various dimensions, including malicious and legitimate requests.

DescribePauseProtectionStatus.title: DescribePauseProtectionStatus
DescribePauseProtectionStatus.summary: Queries the protection status of Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribePeakTrend.title: DescribePeakTrend
DescribePeakTrend.summary: Queries the queries per second (QPS) statistics of a WAF instance.

DescribeProductInstances.title: DescribeProductInstances
DescribeProductInstances.summary: Queries the cloud service instances to be added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in transparent proxy mode.

DescribePunishedDomains.title: DescribePunishedDomains
DescribePunishedDomains.summary: Queries a list of domain names that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) and penalized for failing to obtain an Internet Content Provider (ICP) filing.

DescribeResourceInstanceCerts.title: DescribeResourceInstanceCerts
DescribeResourceInstanceCerts.summary: Queries the certificates that are used in cloud service instances. The certificates returned include the certificates within the delegated administrator account and the certificates within members to which specific instances belong. For example, the delegated administrator account has certificate 1, instance lb-xx-1 belongs to member B, and member B has certificate 2. If you specify instance lb-xx-1 in the request, certificate 1 and certificate 2 are returned.

DescribeResourceLogStatus.title: DescribeResourceLogStatus
DescribeResourceLogStatus.summary: Queries whether the log collection feature is enabled for a protected object.

DescribeResourcePort.title: DescribeResourcePort
DescribeResourcePort.summary: Queries the ports of a cloud service instance that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

DescribeResourceRegionId.title: DescribeResourceRegionId
DescribeResourceRegionId.summary: Queries the region IDs of the resources that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) by using the SDK integration mode. The resources refer to Application Load Balancer (ALB) and Microservices Engine (MSE) instances.

DescribeResourceSupportRegions.title: DescribeResourceSupportRegions
DescribeResourceSupportRegions.summary: Queries the region IDs of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) and Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances that are added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in cloud native mode.

DescribeResponseCodeTrendGraph.title: DescribeResponseCodeTrendGraph
DescribeResponseCodeTrendGraph.summary: Queries the trend of the number of error codes that are returned to clients or Web Application Firewall (WAF). The error codes include 302, 405, 444, 499, and 5XX.

DescribeRuleGroups.title: DescribeRuleGroups
DescribeRuleGroups.summary: Queries regular expression rule groups by page.

DescribeRuleHitsTopClientIp.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopClientIp
DescribeRuleHitsTopClientIp.summary: Queries the top 10 IP addresses from which attacks are initiated.

DescribeRuleHitsTopResource.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopResource
DescribeRuleHitsTopResource.summary: Queries the top 10 protected objects that trigger protection rules.

DescribeRuleHitsTopRuleId.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopRuleId
DescribeRuleHitsTopRuleId.summary: Queries the IDs of the top 10 protection rules that are matched by requests.

DescribeRuleHitsTopTuleType.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopTuleType
DescribeRuleHitsTopTuleType.summary: Queries the top 10 protection modules that are matched.

DescribeRuleHitsTopUa.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopUa
DescribeRuleHitsTopUa.summary: Queries the top 10 user agents that are used to initiate attacks.

DescribeRuleHitsTopUrl.title: DescribeRuleHitsTopUrl
DescribeRuleHitsTopUrl.summary: Queries the top 10 URLs that trigger protection rules.

DescribeSecurityEventLogs.title: DescribeSecurityEventLogs
DescribeSecurityEventLogs.summary: Queries the logs of attack traffic. Each log records the details of a request that matches protection rules.

DescribeSecurityEventTimeSeriesMetric.title: DescribeSecurityEventTimeSeriesMetric
DescribeSecurityEventTimeSeriesMetric.summary: Queries the time series data of attack traffic. Attack requests refer to requests that match protection rules and are identified as risky.

DescribeSecurityEventTopNMetric.title: DescribeSecurityEventTopNMetric
DescribeSecurityEventTopNMetric.summary: Queries top N data entries of attack traffic. The system performs statistical aggregation on attack traffic from specific dimensions and returns top N data entries.

DescribeSensitiveApiStatistic.title: DescribeSensitiveApiStatistic
DescribeSensitiveApiStatistic.summary: Queries the personal information-related APIs and domain names.

DescribeSensitiveDetectionResult.title: DescribeSensitiveDetectionResult
DescribeSensitiveDetectionResult.summary: Queries the compliance check results of API security.

DescribeSensitiveOutboundDistribution.title: DescribeSensitiveOutboundDistribution
DescribeSensitiveOutboundDistribution.summary: Queries the traffic distribution of personal information records involved in cross-border data transfer.

DescribeSensitiveOutboundStatistic.title: DescribeSensitiveOutboundStatistic
DescribeSensitiveOutboundStatistic.summary: Queries the data types of personal information involved in cross-border data transfer.

DescribeSensitiveOutboundTrend.title: DescribeSensitiveOutboundTrend
DescribeSensitiveOutboundTrend.summary: Queries the trends of cross-border data transfer of personal information.

DescribeSensitiveRequestLog.title: DescribeSensitiveRequestLog
DescribeSensitiveRequestLog.summary: Queries the access logs of sensitive data.

DescribeSensitiveRequests.title: DescribeSensitiveRequests
DescribeSensitiveRequests.summary: Queries the tracing results of sensitive data.

DescribeSensitiveStatistic.title: DescribeSensitiveStatistic
DescribeSensitiveStatistic.summary: Queries the sensitive data statistics of the tracing and auditing feature.

DescribeSlsAuthStatus.title: DescribeSlsAuthStatus
DescribeSlsAuthStatus.summary: Queries whether Web Application Firewall (WAF) is authorized to access Logstores.

DescribeSlsLogStore.title: DescribeSlsLogStore
DescribeSlsLogStore.summary: Queries information about a Logstore, such as the total capacity, storage duration, and used capacity.

DescribeSlsLogStoreStatus.title: DescribeSlsLogStoreStatus
DescribeSlsLogStoreStatus.summary: Queries the status of a Simple Log Service Logstore.

DescribeTemplateResourceCount.title: DescribeTemplateResourceCount
DescribeTemplateResourceCount.summary: Queries the number of protected resources for which a protection template takes effect.

DescribeTemplateResources.title: DescribeTemplateResources
DescribeTemplateResources.summary: Queries the resources that are associated to a protection rule template.

DescribeUserAbnormalTrend.title: DescribeUserAbnormalTrend
DescribeUserAbnormalTrend.summary: Queries the trends of API security risks.

DescribeUserAbnormalType.title: DescribeUserAbnormalType
DescribeUserAbnormalType.summary: Queries the types and statistics of risks in the API security module.

DescribeUserApiRequest.title: DescribeUserApiRequest
DescribeUserApiRequest.summary: Queries the traffic statistics of an API.

DescribeUserAsset.title: DescribeUserAsset
DescribeUserAsset.summary: Queries the user asset statistics in the API security module.

DescribeUserEventTrend.title: DescribeUserEventTrend
DescribeUserEventTrend.summary: Queries the trends of attacks detected by the API security module.

DescribeUserEventType.title: DescribeUserEventType
DescribeUserEventType.summary: Queries the types and statistics of security events in the API security module.

DescribeUserSlsLogRegions.title: DescribeUserSlsLogRegions
DescribeUserSlsLogRegions.summary: Queries available regions for log storage.

DescribeUserWafLogStatus.title: DescribeUserWafLogStatus
DescribeUserWafLogStatus.summary: Queries the status, region ID, and status modification time of Web Application Firewall (WAF) logs.

DescribeVisitTopIp.title: DescribeVisitTopIp
DescribeVisitTopIp.summary: Queries the top 10 IP addresses from which requests are sent.

DescribeVisitUas.title: DescribeVisitUas
DescribeVisitUas.summary: Queries the top 10 user agents that are used to initiate requests.

DescribeWafSourceIpSegment.title: DescribeWafSourceIpSegment
DescribeWafSourceIpSegment.summary: Queries the back-to-origin CIDR blocks of a Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to a resource.

ListTagValues.title: ListTagValues
ListTagValues.summary: Queries the tag values of a tag key.

ModifyApisecAbnormals.title: ModifyApisecAbnormals
ModifyApisecAbnormals.summary: Modifies the status of multiple risks detected by the API security module at a time.

ModifyApisecApiResource.title: ModifyApisecApiResource
ModifyApisecApiResource.summary: Modifies the annotations of APIs in the API security module.

ModifyApisecEvents.title: ModifyApisecEvents
ModifyApisecEvents.summary: Modifies the status of multiple security events detected by the API security module at a time.

ModifyApisecLogDelivery.title: ModifyApisecLogDelivery
ModifyApisecLogDelivery.summary: Modifies the configurations of API security log subscription.

ModifyApisecLogDeliveryStatus.title: ModifyApisecLogDeliveryStatus
ModifyApisecLogDeliveryStatus.summary: Modifies the status of API security log subscription.

ModifyApisecModuleStatus.title: ModifyApisecModuleStatus
ModifyApisecModuleStatus.summary: Changes the status of features in the API security module for protected objects or protected object groups.

ModifyApisecStatus.title: ModifyApisecStatus
ModifyApisecStatus.summary: Changes the status of the API security module for protected objects or protected object groups.

ModifyCloudResource.title: ModifyCloudResource
ModifyCloudResource.summary: Modifies the configurations of a service that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

ModifyDefaultHttps.title: ModifyDefaultHttps
ModifyDefaultHttps.summary: Modifies the default Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Transport Layer Security (TLS) settings.

ModifyDefenseResourceGroup.title: ModifyDefenseResourceGroup
ModifyDefenseResourceGroup.summary: Modifies the configurations of a protected object group.

ModifyDefenseResourceXff.title: ModifyDefenseResourceXff
ModifyDefenseResourceXff.summary: Modifies the cookie settings of a protected object and the method to identify the originating IP addresses of clients.

ModifyDefenseRule.title: ModifyDefenseRule
ModifyDefenseRule.summary: Modifies the configurations of a protection rule.

ModifyDefenseRuleCache.title: ModifyDefenseRuleCache
ModifyDefenseRuleCache.summary: Updates the cached page of a website that is protected based on a website tamper-proofing rule.

ModifyDefenseRuleStatus.title: ModifyDefenseRuleStatus
ModifyDefenseRuleStatus.summary: Changes the status of a protection rule.

ModifyDefenseTemplate.title: ModifyDefenseTemplate
ModifyDefenseTemplate.summary: Modifies the configurations of a protection rule template.

ModifyDefenseTemplateStatus.title: ModifyDefenseTemplateStatus
ModifyDefenseTemplateStatus.summary: Changes the status of a protection rule template.

ModifyDomain.title: ModifyDomain
ModifyDomain.summary: Modifies the configurations of a domain name that is added to Web Application Firewall (WAF) in CNAME record mode.

ModifyDomainPunishStatus.title: ModifyDomainPunishStatus
ModifyDomainPunishStatus.summary: Re-adds a domain name that is penalized for failing to obtain an Internet Content Provider (ICP) filing to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

ModifyHybridCloudCluster.title: ModifyHybridCloudCluster
ModifyHybridCloudCluster.summary: Modifies information about a hybrid cloud cluster.

ModifyHybridCloudClusterBypassStatus.title: ModifyHybridCloudClusterBypassStatus
ModifyHybridCloudClusterBypassStatus.summary: Enables or disables manual bypass for a hybrid cloud cluster whose type is set to SDK Integration Mode.

ModifyHybridCloudClusterRule.title: ModifyHybridCloudClusterRule
ModifyHybridCloudClusterRule.summary: Modifies the rule of a hybrid cloud cluster.

ModifyHybridCloudGroup.title: ModifyHybridCloudGroup
ModifyHybridCloudGroup.summary: Modifies a node group in a hybrid cloud cluster.

ModifyHybridCloudGroupExpansionServer.title: ModifyHybridCloudGroupExpansionServer
ModifyHybridCloudGroupExpansionServer.summary: Adds a node to a node group of a hybrid cloud cluster.

ModifyHybridCloudGroupShrinkServer.title: ModifyHybridCloudGroupShrinkServer
ModifyHybridCloudGroupShrinkServer.summary: Deletes a node from a node group of a hybrid cloud cluster.

ModifyHybridCloudSdkPullinStatus.title: ModifyHybridCloudSdkPullinStatus
ModifyHybridCloudSdkPullinStatus.summary: Modifies the traffic redirection status of a hybrid cloud cluster by using an SDK.

ModifyHybridCloudServer.title: ModifyHybridCloudServer
ModifyHybridCloudServer.summary: Modifies the information about a hybrid cloud node.

ModifyLogDeliveryConfig.title: ModifyLogDeliveryConfig
ModifyLogDeliveryConfig.summary: Modifies a hybrid cloud log delivery configuration.

ModifyMajorProtectionBlackIp.title: ModifyMajorProtectionBlackIp
ModifyMajorProtectionBlackIp.summary: Modifies an IP address blacklist for major event protection.

ModifyMemberAccount.title: ModifyMemberAccount
ModifyMemberAccount.summary: Modifies the information about members that are added for multi-account management.

ModifyPauseProtectionStatus.title: ModifyPauseProtectionStatus
ModifyPauseProtectionStatus.summary: Modifies the protection status of Web Application Firewall (WAF).

ModifyResourceLogStatus.title: ModifyResourceLogStatus
ModifyResourceLogStatus.summary: Enables or disables the log collection feature for a protected object.

ModifyTemplateResources.title: ModifyTemplateResources
ModifyTemplateResources.summary: Associates or disassociates a protected object or protected object group with or from a protection rule template.

ReleaseInstance.title: ReleaseInstance
ReleaseInstance.summary: Releases a Web Application Firewall (WAF) 3.0 instance.

SyncProductInstance.title: SyncProductInstance
SyncProductInstance.summary: Synchronizes Elastic Compute Service (ECS), Classic Load Balancer (CLB), and Network Load Balancer (NLB) instances to Web Application Firewall (WAF).

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from resources and then deletes the tags.

VerifyDomainOwner.title: VerifyDomainOwner
VerifyDomainOwner.summary: Verifies the ownership of a domain name.
